question: Can I be anorexic & bulimic at the same time ?
question_content:
My daily calories are under 300 a day. I mostly eat a cup of 6 strawberries ( 3-6 calories in each one ) but when I visit my dad he takes us out to eat & he doesn't know I have an eating disorder so to not make it obvious I eat & then ask to go to the bathroom & i purge 

please help !

answers.answer_content: Yes. But please know, you're body is beautiful as is. There is no reason to purge. If you truly want to lose weight, do it a healthy way. Eat healthy and exorcise and I promise you'll see better results and feel better at the same time.

there is actually a kind of anorexia where the severely restrict their calorie intake and if the go above their limit they purge.... so i assume that you are this type 

I hope i helped :)
